lesson_info.title: Python Basics for Data Science
lesson_info.description: Variables, data types, and basic operations

learning_objectives: Understand the fundamental concepts and principles of Python Basics for Data Science
Apply Python Basics for Data Science techniques in practical, real-world scenarios
Analyze the relationship between Python Basics for Data Science and other topics in Python Programming Fundamentals
Evaluate the effectiveness of different approaches to Python Basics for Data Science
Create solutions using Python Basics for Data Science methodologies and best practices
